name: Booster Energy

name: Scarlet Book
effect: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Sada” written on it in clumsy handwriting.

effect: An ingredient for sandwiches.

name: Scroll of Waters

name: Smoked Fillet
